message.content: We refer to Wikipedia articles on medicine for help. The symptoms of difficulty swallowing and double-vision suggest botulism, which is caused by Clostridium botulinum, a rod-shaped bacteria that is not spore-forming. It is also known to be a gram-positive bacterium that produces a neurotoxin that causes paralysis. Thus, option (C) is the correct answer.
